text: The Clearing is a American post-apocalyptic zombie thriller movie, Directed by David Matalon, together with the main cast Liam McIntyre, Aundrea Smith, Steven Swadling and Sydelle Noe, was filmed on June 4, 2020 in the United States.https://www.flickeringmyth.com/2020/06/movie-review-the- clearing-2020http://culturecrypt.com/movie-reviews/the- clearing-2020https://moviesandmania.com/2020/05/21/the-clearing-reviews-movie- film-horror-zombies-2020-overview ==Cast== * Liam McIntyre as Tom * Aundrea Smith as Mira * Steven Swadling as Ranger * Sydelle Noel as Naomi ==Related pages== * Cargo (2017 movie) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 action movies Category:2020 thriller movies Category:2020s action thriller movies Category:American action movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Drama thriller movies Category:Zombie movies
title: The Clearing
